Our intimate oil formulated by our certified herbalist, this fusion of natural essential oils helps maintain Ph balance for women, soothes skin, ease discomfort, irritation and itchiness, keeps your skin moisturized, gently cleanses, stimulates and moisturizes the feminine area, leaving it supple and free of any odors. And keeps your V smelling like fresh strawberry fruits.

【PH Balance Daily Intimate Wash】 BASSI organic yoni bar soap for women a healthy vaginal pH is acidic, somewhere between 3.8 to 4.5. Our feminine wash bar for women have a healthy pH of 4.5 to 5 so you can feel confident, comfortable, and healthy. Use with confidence as it enhances your natural pH to prevent irritation.

【Fragrance-free Feminine Wash】 BASSI feminine wash designed for vagina and is free from dyes & parabens & harmful chemicals to give you a simple, ph-balancing formula infused with kinds of natural extracts. Yoni wash for women with no sulfates, dyes or fragrances. That will help you keep your most sensitive area clean, fresh, and protected all day long.

【Improve Feminine Intimate Elasticity】BASSI yoni oil feminine care oil is rich in antioxidants and provides effective relief from dryness, itch and remove odor resulting from workouts and menstruation while also promoting skin tone / elasticity and eliminating odor, sweetening your sacred petals with the fresh and clean fragrance.

【Moisturizing & Smoothing】 BASSI yoni care set that feminine vaginal oil, yoni soap bar and yoni wash blend will help promote your skin and vaginal moisturized and hydrated throughout the day while helping reduce the effects of irritation, flaky skin and vaginal dryness and pH balanced along with leaving behind a subtle refreshing scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product arrived very fast. This products packaging was very secured and intact. I highly recommend this product as it is very gentle for sensitive skin. It has an amazing very light fragrance that lasts for days. I used the soap first, then I followed with the gel wash and ended with the oil. It left me feeling fresh and very clean. The oil moisturizes the vulva and leaves a very natural fruit like aroma, nothing strong. For women over 50, this product leaves you fresh with no dryness. I also highly recommend this product for young ladies coming of age that can use something sensative, fresh, and natural. I will continue to buy this product from now on for my feminine wash. This is a must buy 100% if your looking for a natural cleaning product for your lady parts.

reviews.reviewText: I was so does it work so well is it better I hope I literally strawberry after using the soap in the shower using the oil and the gel as directed I really love the packaging and the one thing I do love you seller holds nothing back and tells you straight out that it's for that lady part and is not shy about explaining it which to me encourages women to be more self accepting so the product maked us smell good and feel fresh...as women we slly silently worry about our lady parts not being up to par I commend the seller for the message they send to eomen to love and care for themselvesObviously I love the soap , gel ,and oil they are just so refreshing

reviews.reviewerName: First time trying yoni, after I saw Bassi brand was recommended. And it did not disappoint the soap was the highlight because of the rich lather, and it kept me fresh all day/night. The gel was okay but the oil was awesome. It was non greasy, and smells like fresh strawberries. I will order again from this brand but I'll stick to the soap.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Super artificial smelling, but surprisingly refreshing considering I generally am VERY sensitive to new products. Not a single reaction and I’ve been using all products in the strawberry set for a week. Oil is great during dry days and does well to help PH! The mesh is also good that they give you for the bar, but I dislike how the wash has beads in it (super bad for the genital area). Cheap materials, but works for the price.
